text: The Party for the Animals, Dutch: Partij voor de Dieren (shortened PvdD), is a Dutch political party. The Party for the Animals was established in 2002 and supports animal rights and fights global warming. Number of seats in the 2023 elections: 3 (-3). == Political leaders == * Marianne Thieme - 2002-2019 * Esther Ouwehand - 2019- == Other websites == * Website of the Party for the Animals Category:Political parties in the Netherlands Category:2002 establishments in the Netherlands
title: Party for the Animals
